name: publishDraftWorkflowScheme
description:
Publishes a draft workflow scheme.

Where the draft workflow includes new workflow statuses for an issue type, mappings are provided to update issues with the original workflow status to the new workflow status.

This operation is [asynchronous](#async). Follow the `location` link in the response to determine the status of the task and use [Get task](#api-rest-api-3-task-taskId-get) to obtain updates.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

id.description: The ID of the workflow scheme that the draft belongs to.

validateOnly.description: Whether the request only performs a validation.

$ul: **elapsedRuntime**: The execution time of the task, in milliseconds.
**finished**: A timestamp recording when the task was finished.
**lastUpdate**: A timestamp recording when the task progress was last updated.
**message**: Information about the progress of the task.
**progress**: The progress of the task, as a percentage complete.
**result**: The result of the task execution.
**started**: A timestamp recording when the task was started.
**submitted**: A timestamp recording when the task was submitted.
**submittedBy**: The ID of the user who submitted the task.
